Reading through the "What's next" list and the focus list.
Where
Is
Dominion
And
Twisted Treeline.
Seriously, in the recent Q&A someone asked, Riot gave an answer that was basically "When the community gives us enough feedback about it, we'll think about it", and then proceeds to blatantly ignore everyone else.
I'm getting really sick of this.
There IS feedback, somebody asks every bloody day. There is NO OTHER server that doesn't have full queue options, and we've been going for years. This is NOT beta anymore.
I don't want "Oh yeah sure, we'll think about it." I want to know WHY it hasn't happened, WHAT'S stopping it from happening, and WHAT we can do to make it happen.
I'm sick of the constant lack of respect, we deserve information not dodges.

THERE'S your "Riot pls".

No matter how I answer this it's going to be a disappointing one. I wish I could say 'we're turning them all on right now' but I can't.

Twisted treeline is not in a place where we can expand it beyond the current availability yet. It's healthy as it is, but it has not grown to the point of further expansion. Ranked Twisted Treeline has stricter population requirements than Normal 3v3 and again is not currently in a place where we can open it.

It is the same for Dominion, etc. If we do get to a place where we can open it, we'll announce it on the boards, and we have passionate Rioters fighting for each and every mode in every evaluation meeting but at the end of the day it's about going through the numbers and making sure the queue would be a healthy experience. Right now it would not be but hopefully in the future it will.

I just really hope they do consider or ATLEAST try make sandbox a thing, realease it on PBE or make it a thing like Urf for all i care! With the removal of dominion and the map itself custom games now feel almost useless. I can see your points but opening it to the servers for maybe even a weekend would be great. Before dominion was removed Hide and Seek was a game. Now try that on ARAM, Twisted Treeline or even Summoners Rift. It isnt the same, the madness can last for ages. You add 5 friends to the game start a skype call and bam, league suddenly has another gamemode.. Created by the community. Since its removal there is still custom ideas but its honestly not the same. Now add a sandbox mode.... You'll have people making sooo many different fun gametypes you wouldnt believe it. Hide and seek will be reborn, even those who loved dominion might get a chance at recreating it in a updated version. Basically add a summoners rift with no walls, maybe monsters with the option of removal (same goes for turrets, inhibs, minions and maybe even the nexus.) and allow players to actually expierience a "Custom game". Honestly its a great idea adding a Rotating queue for unique gamemodes such as All41 but bring back custom games, they honestly have potential. Sure keep your featured gamemodes and I understand adding this could ruing things like URF but these gamemodes is what makes the game truly fun. Back to the topic of making maps..  I personally could see these types of messing with game stats or champion stats to be hilarious. Replace baron with who? Gromp. add 500 damage per auto, (Significant range since nerf) 600 armour and magic resist 10000 health (Buffs such as 40% less damage from champions or maybe even a corrosive attack and watch as 5 people fight to kill one of leagues basic monsters! I really hope Riot sees potential in what would bring back custom games and who knows what the community can find .{{item:3060}}
